channel.title: Comments on: Chrome 19 Beta Crashes on stevesouders.com

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/04/30/chrome-19-beta-crashes-on-stevesouders-com/#comment-3961">Benjamin Cahill</a>.
Possible. I generally keep the number of plugins I use fairly small, but could that one of them isn't playing nice with Chrome 19.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Benjamin Cahill.

Possible. I generally keep the number of plugins I use fairly small, but could that one of them isn’t playing nice with Chrome 19.

item.title: By: Benjamin Cahill
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Cahill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/04/30/chrome-19-beta-crashes-on-stevesouders-com/#comment-3960">Joseph Scott</a>.
jazka on ##apple/freenode tested on Chrome 19.0.1084.36 beta and could not reproduce.
Perhaps something with your setup? You should try with a fresh profile.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joseph Scott.

jazka on ##apple/freenode tested on Chrome 19.0.1084.36 beta and could not reproduce.

Perhaps something with your setup? You should try with a fresh profile.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/04/30/chrome-19-beta-crashes-on-stevesouders-com/#comment-3959">Benjamin Cahill</a>.
Interesting, I wonder if it is Mac specific.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Benjamin Cahill.

Interesting, I wonder if it is Mac specific.

item.title: By: Benjamin Cahill
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Cahill
item.description: I tested 19.0.1084.36 beta on Arch Linux x86_64, and it didn't crash.
item.content:encoded: I tested 19.0.1084.36 beta on Arch Linux x86_64, and it didn’t crash.
